name: SkySmash 1918
description:
SkySmash 1918 is a universal app that runs great on any iPhone / iPod touch / iPad. Now with enhanced graphics for iPhone 4 Retina display and iPad!

NOW ON SALE FOR A LIMITED TIME - 50% OFF!

---------------------------------

Can you single-handedly turn the tide of World War 1?

Classic arcade Shoot Em Up action rejuvenated for the 21st century!

Features:

- 9 big levels
- Huge end of level bosses
- 10 collectable powerups, including Bouncing Bomb, Time Warp and Smart Bomb
- Incredible detailed graphics and animation
- Amazing lighting and special effects
- Atmospheric music and sound effects
- Easy/Medium/Hard difficulty settings
